rules.name: SPEN_AcceptedNotPaid
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Accepted Not Paid

rules.name: SPEN_PaidNotAccepted
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND (4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7
rules.label: Paid Not Accepted

rules.name: SPEN_AcceptedandPaid
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4) AND 5 AND (6 OR 7) AND 8 AND 9
rules.label: Accepted and Paid

rules.name: SPEN_GSCallRequired
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 8) AND 5 AND (6 OR 7) AND 9
rules.label: GS Call Required
